title: 2 Player Crazy Racer
description:
Drive on the Streets of Long Island in the 60's  
Fancy of retro cars and surroundings?  Want to take a ride with a classic car?  Try 2 Player Crazy Racer, a fantastic 3D racing game that you can play with your friend using a single keyboard.  Be the winner of the race, gather the coins and unlock your dream vintage car.
